alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 1:28PM MST until January 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and western Texas. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
